page_content:
Accenture (UK) Limited

Accenture Enterprise Mobility Services

Accenture's range of enterprise mobility services help you to plan, implement and control your use of mobile devices, applications and technologies.  Accenture can help to develop your strategy and roadmap, guide selection of devices and platforms, and develop solutions, integrated with business systems and services to meet business value objectives.

Features

  • BYOD planning and delivery
  • Mobile strategy development, roadmaps and delivery blueprints
  • User experience (UX) workshops, prototyping and usability labs
  • Multi-platform development (native, hybrid or mobile web)
  • Reusable architecture frameworks, tools and solution accelerators
  • Mobile testing labs covering functionality, security, reliability and compatibility
  • Managed service for mobile device and application management (MDM/MAM)
  • Over-the-air app installation, configuration, update and remote wipe
  • Fully integrated workforce management service for field-workers
  • Management, planning, scheduling, dispatch and training components

Benefits

  • Leverage technology investments, make existing applications mobile
  • Help increase effectiveness, productivity and employee satisfaction
  • Leverage knowledge, expertise and best practice from across industries
  • Agile processes designed to scale and flex to requirements
  • Mobile applications are future proof and backward compatible
  • Employ business-driven testing: Reporting on quality using advanced metrics
  • Simplified, centralised device management with policy-driven control
  • Reduced cost of deployment, operations and inventory control
  • Extend the back office into the field
  • Increase data quality and reduce travel and re-keying

Pricing

£815 per person per day

  • Excluding VAT
  • Termination costs apply
  • Minimum contract period: Other
